channel.title: System on Product Designer, CDO at buzzvil
channel.description: Recent content in System on Product Designer, CDO at buzzvil

item.title: Head of Design @buzzvil
item.description: Alongside my current role as Product Manager, I lead a very compact and efficient team of rockstar designers. Considering my resources, I focused on building a very agile and autonomous Design work process based on high-quality hirings and autonomous workflows. All Designers are performing Peer reviews to promote feedback while all of us belong to different mission teams.
